LightningComponentBundle.description: Lightning web component that scans a barcode and returns the captured text.

property.name: actionType
property.label: Action type
property.datasource: Scan a URL,Run a Flow,Run Apex
property.description: The kind of action you wish the component to take.

property.name: cardTitle
property.label: Card Title
property.description: The title to be used at the top of the card.

property.name: hideComponentIfNoScanner
property.label: Hide if no scanner available
property.description: Hide the component entirely if no scanner is available; otherwise just show a greyed-out button.

property.name: debug
property.label: Show debug panel after scan
property.description: Show the raw text of the scanned barcode in a panel after the scan is complete.

property.name: buttonLabel
property.label: Button label
property.description: The label on the button that initiates the barcode scan.

property.name: instructions
property.label: Instruction text
property.default: Press the button below to open the camera. Position a barcode in the scanner window to scan it.
property.description: Instructions for using the bar code scanner.

property.name: instructionsColor
property.label: Instruction text color
property.description: Color of the instructions text, in rgb(x,y,z) or #xxyyzz format.

property.name: flowApiName
property.label: Flow API name
property.description: API name of the flow to run with text scanned from barcode (required if the action type is 'Run a Flow').

property.name: apexClassName
property.label: Apex class name
property.description: Name of the Apex class to run with text scanned from barcode (required if the action type is 'Run Apex').

property.name: successMessage
property.label: Flow/Apex success message
property.description: A message that will appear in a toast when the flow or Apex class is successfully run.
